website_summaries.verdict: An excellent, featured-packed sous vide machine that allows you to prepare restaurant quality meals at home.
pros: Can heat water from 104 to 195 degrees
Offers a clear, easy-to-read display and touchscreen controls
Durable design features stainless steel and a comfortable rubber handle
Can be used with or without an Instant Pot
cons: Some users find it doesn’t heat the water uniformly so there may be cold spots

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a mini- Sous Vide cooler cooker!!!
customer_reviews.text: This the perfect Unit to make a mini-Sous Vide cooler cooker! Great project... Perfect gadgetry to keep at work for healthier eating on a daily basis!!!
customer_reviews.author: scoruud

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, but needs a larger container than an Instant Pot.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a few times now. It's easy to use, and the results taste great, but it's much more difficult than expected to fit food into the pot from an Instant Pot. It's allegedly compatible, but I honestly wouldn't recommend it unless you're only ever cooking single portions. I recommend you get a separate, larger pot to use with this.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Spriggs

customer_reviews.title: Product Defective/Exchange Impossible
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work. Continually shows an E4 error message, regardless of water level. Amazon cannot replace, only give a credit back. That does not allow me to replace the defective unit since it was purchased on sale. Instant Pot help line is not open on the weekend. Just frustrated, as the actual Instant Pot I have is great.
customer_reviews.author: Here And Now

customer_reviews.title: Cannot read instructions!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product if you're thinking there will be an easy to read cooking guide - the instruction booklet is fine until you arrive at page 9 "Cooking Guidelines" and the print is faded out to the point of unreadable. Cooking guidelines are pretty important (food type, thickness, temp and time). Using a bright light I was able to read enough to recreate the information in a word document. I wish I bought the Joule.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No app needed.
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews of other immersion circulators and having to rely on an app, I chose this one, partly because of that and the fact that the Instant Pot pressure cooker has been great. I am not disappointed. This thing is great. Everything turns out excellent. Shrimp and bacon were the two biggest surprises so far. Shrimp comes out perfectly textured but I have to work on the seasoning a bit. Throw the bacon in before bedtime and the next morning it cooks in the pan in maybe 2-3 minutes. I wouldn't say it tastes any better but it fry's super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I chose this because of the simple interface. No Bluetooth, no app, just set temperature, set time, press play. The clamp is not height adjustable, but I knew it would fit perfectly on my Instant Pot cooker insert. It should work with something in your kitchen anyway. I've checked the temp with another thermometer and it has consistently been within half a degree. It's whisper quiet. If something gets stick in the propeller, the metal cover comes right off and goes on again easily. Overall, this seems like everything you need and nothing you don't.
customer_reviews.author: Guy in Philly

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It works, only rated 4 stars until I see if it continues to work. Pros- easy to use, extremely accurate temperature control, quiet. Cons- clamp is awkward on plastic containers like the Rubbermaid 12 qt., only 800 watts so slow to heat unless using hot water to start. Satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: KeithG

customer_reviews.title: Know the products limits and research the correct time and temperature to cooks individual foods.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is an exceptional product. My wife and I prep all our meals on Sunday precisely portioned for our diet. Then on my lunch break I drop the bags in the water bath at the appropriate temperature, when I come home everything is ready to go! I also knew a guy who would use it in his office very discretely (very doable). The main reason I bought one was I didn’t want to ruin prime steaks. The sous vide makes it easy and stress free to cook truly phenomenal food easily and with very little clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX!!
customer_reviews.text: Came in today. Plug it in it lights up and you can set temp and time. Turn it on the screen goes black and it resets to 133F 4:00 Hours. Been on hold with customer support FOREVER. Will update if I ever get a response.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hartsock

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and perfect meats every time.
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this way of cooking. The instant pot Sous-vide has made my cooking so much better. No more over cooked meats and oh my goodness is my steak perfect every time I use this. Better then the restaurants in my area. This does require longing cooking times but you don’t have to baby sit it or cut into your meats to see if they are done throughout the cooking. I use this almost every night. I have both an 8 quart and 6 quart pot and it works in both as advertised but I use it more in the 8 quart since it has more space. I can cook 4 steaks at a time.
customer_reviews.author: sewnuts

customer_reviews.title: failed
customer_reviews.text: twice this Circulator stopped working - I now have 2 pounds of beef that was sitting in tepid water all night.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Fischer

customer_reviews.title: No frills, just works
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on sale in mid-2019... then proceeded to not get around to using it until early 2020. What a mistake! Over the past 4 months I've experimented with a wide range of meats from pork and beef roasts to steaks, chicken, you name it. As I've gotten used to exactly what times and temperatures produce the results I like, I have been blown away by how much of an improvement sous vide can be for many cuts. Product has performed perfectly for many, many cooks over the 4 month period. In fact, I liked its performance and value so much I bought one for our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: kirbic

customer_reviews.title: Pick another brand
customer_reviews.text: I started off liking this so much I asked my husband for a second one. Bad decision. I just don’t think this brand of sous vide device measures up to the more expensive ones. I’ve taken meat out of the sous vide pot after 24+ hours with the meat still nearly raw. I don’t think the circulation is good. I tried to get in touch with the manufacturer, and after a couple of e-mails, they apparently lost interest in trying to resolve my concerns. I’d say buckle down, get the more expensive device. Leave Instant Pot brand to make their pressure cookers (which they do VERY well), not sous vide devices.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: First sous vide am very pleased with results.
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure we would like this but it has been great. First the quality is great, second it is spot on temperature control, third it is the only way to make top quality foods with lower budget cuts of meat. We've made moist great tasting chicken and roast beef lunch meat better than at the deli and for about a third of the cost. There is a learning curve for cooking times and temps but with a little perseverance you will be eating the best tasting with no added chemicals food you could ever want. Give it try I think you'll love it after the learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: steve's view

customer_reviews.title: my husband is addicted
customer_reviews.text: my husband bought yet another kitchen gadget. He loves to make steak and chicken with this. The steak is great, medium all the way thru. It is very easy to use. Clean up is a breeze. Of all the kitchen gadgets, this one is great because it has minimal clean up and doesn't take up much space. And it works well. Definitely a good purchase for a budding chef.
customer_reviews.author: KimB

customer_reviews.title: Sous vide is pretty great, and this is a great way to do it
customer_reviews.text: I am not a sous vide expert, but I have really enjoyed using this thing. I have particularly enjoyed it with beef and pork. If you plan ahead, you can cook meat in an amazing way that you may have never experienced before. Before I bought this model, I tried a sous vide product that I borrowed from my brother, and I did not like that it required pairing with my phone (and using their weird app) to even make it work. This one is very simple to use (without any additional devices), and I am very glad that I have it. I use it a couple times per month, and if it broke I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant to try Sous Vide cooking but when this was offered at a reasonable price on Prime day, I thought why not? Very happy with my purchase. It’s easy to use and has turned out great steak and salmon so far. I trust the Instant Pot brand. Not sure what the more expensive brands offer that this doesn’t. However, it works really well for cooking for two.
customer_reviews.author: C.V.

customer_reviews.title: Moist and perfect every time
customer_reviews.text: I find this appliance very easy and straight forward to use. I have done steaks, chicken, and even reheated lasagna with it. I love that you can’t over cook anything and it will keep the food at the perfect temperature until I’m ready for it. You really must brown meats after cooking with this method. The only exception was chicken for a chicken salad. Things come out moist and flavorful! A seal-a-meal make this foolproof.
customer_reviews.author: Diane T13

customer_reviews.title: So it doesn't have Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Who cares that it lacks an app or Bluetooth control? Do you really need those features for setting a bag of meat into a tub of water? What it does it does well. Keeps the temp stable and produces delicious food.
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this twice so far and am pleased with the outcomes. It is quite simple to use and does the job. After a couple of uses I’d say it’s a good product to own. I didn’t want to pay for a model with all the extra bells and whistles. They would have been nice to have, but not really worth the cost difference, and would be concerned about having issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: Raptor

customer_reviews.title: Outrageous bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: If you don't care about all the silly bells and whistles on the upscale circulaters but do expect precise temperature control, look no further. Although not particularly fast getting to temperature, this does everything I want from a circulater and nothing I don't. I've only used it three times so how long it keeps performing so well is a separate matter to be determined over the next five years of heavy use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: urbanito

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Super quiet. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second sous-vide machine I own. The other I have is a different brand with more power. I like this one because it’s sooooo quiet. So if you need a machine to come up to temperature quickly, get a higher watt machine. But with sous-vide that’s not really necessary cause cook times are stupid long anyway. It takes maybe twice as long to get to temp but you can’t even tell it’s running it’s so quiet...which is nice if you got something in the water for two days. I love it. I’ve held a temp of 203 with it. It gets there n keeps it there. Excellent value. Make yourself a steak already!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C.

customer_reviews.title: Great way to cook meat!
customer_reviews.text: I never even heard of sous vide until a friend mentioned it a few months ago. We cooked cheap sirloin steaks with this and they came out like NY strip. Chicken breast...perfect. London broil...amazing.
customer_reviews.author: M. F. Brink

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, was I amazed and so was my family. Just as a trial, I cooked chicken and it was truly the beat chicken I’ve had. I can’t wait to make my New York steaks tonight! Very simple and easy to use. I was a little nervous about getting it thinking I wouldn’t use it that often, I’m so glad I got it and I know I’ll be using it quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Do WORK

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Sept 2, 2019 and we've used this about 2-4 times a week. Went to use this Nov 1, 2019 and it shows the temp of 211 degrees and is not heating up.
customer_reviews.author: CMKenyon

customer_reviews.title: Get a Sous Vide Circulator
customer_reviews.text: This is my first adventure into sous vide so I'm not sure how this particular product performs against other but this one is easy to use and has completely changed how I'm cooking food from here out. I received it on Thursday, its the following Monday and I've done salmon, steak and chicken breasts. And each one has been the best version I've made for myself. The chicken is a major standout as its completely changed the way I think of chicken. If you're on the fence about this thing, just get it.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sous vide to step up my steak game and this delivered. I chose this device because it was cheaper than the others but seemed reliable and user friendly. I've used it about 10 times and I'm very happy with it. I get perfect steaks every single time. The directions and manual were very helpful. Would purchase again 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I reckon I'm going to buy another one!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with my sous vide cooker. I was never a big venison fan because it was always so difficult for me to cook. After trying it in my Instant Pot sous vide cooker, I was very pleased with the results. Tender, juicy, perfectly done venison steaks that were almost indistinguishable from beef. So I tried actual beef and had similarly delicious results. I tried pork chops and they didn't turn out quite as good as I had hoped, but I can't put that blame on the cooker, they were cheap pork chops. There's a million recipes I want to try now!
customer_reviews.author: AM998

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Product from Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend purchasing this immersion circulator by Instant Pot. Simple to use and temperature is true. This is the 4th product by Instant Pot I have and have been very pleased with all of them. Nothing Fancy about the circulator. Basically, all it has is a timer and temperature. But, what more do you need? Instructions are simple. To turn it on, plug it in; turn it off by unplugging! Word of advice: Highly recommend watch a couple of YouTube videos for "Sous Vide" cooking! My favorite are by "Sous Vide Everything."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: So so power. It seems to struggle keeping the water circulated. Warms up quick enough and basically keeps temp, but colder parts in some of the water bath. Water just doesn't seem to be moving much if I have more than a couple items in.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Provides a great new way to cook! Especially things easy to overcook, like seafood and steak. Mine is temperature-accurate.....I double checked with another thermometer at several temperatures, quick to heat the water and very easy to use. My husband thinks it makes an annoying buzzing sound, which I hardly notice, so I just use it on a shelf in the pantry and close the door. I couldn’t be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J Forsch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, accurate and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, accurate and quiet. Very easy to use, did not even read the instructions. The temperature is maintained within 1F, perfect stable throughout the cooking process. Cooked scallops, steak and mock Starbucks sous vide eggs to perfection. Wow worth the 70 bucks. Included in the box sous vide pod and instruction book. So far perfectly cooked teriyaki chicken breast, soft boiled eggs and shrimp.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do...and does it well
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do...and does it well. We regularly use it to sous vide meats now, and this product does its job well. Not nearly as expensive as many others, but seems to be very accurate and consistent in maintain the right temperature and time. I have a cooking thermometer and check it several times during a 3 hour cook. They are always within a 1/2 degree. Happy cooker...errrr, camper.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Snow

customer_reviews.title: It Just Works
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several other sous vide units with Bluetooth or Wi-Fi connectivity and phone apps, but none of the ever seemed to give me the results I expected. I had given up on sousvide as something just out of reach for home use until a friend recommended this unit. It was inexpensive enough so I thought I'd take a risk. Worst case, I'd just return it. I am not returning it. This unit just works. No fancy apps. No pairing. No complicated interfaces. Just silent, worry-free cooking. I've done NY steaks, salmon, and even a whole tri-tip roast. Everything was perfect, everytime.
customer_reviews.author: DMM

customer_reviews.title: Calibration off
customer_reviews.text: The calibration is about 4 degrees off - it overheats the water. It stabilizes and holds the heat well, though, so I simply set it lower. For instance, if I want the water to circulate at 160 degrees, I set it for 156 degrees and test with an external thermometer. Holds at 160 degrees for hours, if necessary. I do like the simplicity of the control panel. Overall, I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my wife's favorite present I have got her. She uses it frequently to quickly cook steaks, chicken, etc. The only problem is she wanted a brand new vacuum sealer, but small price for a happy wife. Steaks task more like restaurant steaks now then dried up cheap home made steaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Set it and forget it! I am on the Sous Vide train now and I really like how the food comes out. I have cooked rib eye, london broil and pork lion so far. This product is very easy to setup, set the temperature and time. I am not a chef by any means but this tool is pretty amazing and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Dinneen

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn’t see the point in cooking Sous vide and then cooking it again with a braise or grill, but I recently have gone through An organ transplant and like that I have a larger window of time in cooking and don’t have to worry about over and under cooking Foods. Easy to work even wi my brain and coordination not yet up to snuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Schumaker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sous Vide cooker
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use, fits on the side of my IP perfectly and does exactly what it advertises. Came to temperature pretty fast and the digital read out is large enough to easily see and super easy to set temp and time. Was up and cooking in a matter of minutes. Glad I did not buy a expensive Sous Vide that had a ton of features (like connecting to an app) that I would never use. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rossman

customer_reviews.title: did what it was supposed to do, however not for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made device, was a gift for me, however not something I would use, this requires several hours to cook a steak and I am the last minute type of cook, so it was not something I would benefit from.
customer_reviews.author: davedude

customer_reviews.title: Best gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift. It was such a great purchase (for both of us ;)) It's the first Sous Vide we've ever used, but it was sooo easy to use and works GREAT! I went with the Instant brand because I have an instant pot and love it. Definitely not disappointed! Just make the purchase, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I have two Instant Pots (3 qt. and 6 qt.), so it made sense to go with their sous vide device. I am very pleased with it. It fits perfectly in the 6 qt. pot. I am not sure how well it would work in a larger container. Normally I'm only making one or two portions, so it's fine. My only minor complaint is that the controls face upward. For a short person like me, it's a bit inconvenient and I have to stand on tiptoe to read and adjust the settings. Normal size people should have no trouble.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Oui Oui!!
customer_reviews.text: OMGoodness! We just made our first strip steaks using this. Put the steaks, salt and peppered and added bleu cheese. Vacuum sealed and cooked for about 2 hours. Quick sear and, voila, this was absolutely the best steaks my husband and I have ever eaten!
customer_reviews.author: M. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I know about this years ago!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream to create seriously delicious meals using inexpensive cuts of meat. The Sous Vide cooking process has begun saving me and my family serious money by no longer needing to purchase expensive cuts of meat to get the fantastic flavor and tenderness we have always sought after.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: a must have
customer_reviews.text: After hearing nothing but rave reviews about the Sous Vide I decided to jump in and take a chance when the Instapot brand was on sale. I am SO Glad i did. I mess chicken up every time no matter what. After cooking in the sous vide it came out nice and juicy and not rubbery at all. Can't wait to try other recipes with it
customer_reviews.author: Lee Anne Martes

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY SATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: This unit is so simple to use, the controls are easy on the eyes ---- no squinting to read, and simple to set. Really do enjoy using this machine, set it and forget it. The temperature is accurate, no deviations whatsoever. The cooking time is also accurate. Really satisfied with Instant Pot Sous Veed machine. I also have an Instant Pot pressure cooker, which is excellent. So far the Instant Pot family produces excellent products, and I am happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: Janice B.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We've cooked a few meals with this, and they all turn out great. It immediately became a highly used item in my kitchen. Chicken, steak, and poached eggs come out tasting fabulous. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instant Pot Quality
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 of their products now and they are excellent quality and very versatile. I have the ultra 8 quart slow cooker which also does a sous vide bath but it is better for a larger volume of food so I wanted to try this out for single food items and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Polak

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Sous Vide Cooker
customer_reviews.text: If you're trying out sous vide for the first time and don't want to spend a bundle to see if it's something you'd continue to do; this things great. I'm going to step up to a pricey cooker one of these days, but this one's more than good enough for now. Accurate and quite. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Fun Kitchen Appliance
customer_reviews.text: We are still getting used to this device, but really like it so far. A word of advice -- preheat takes quite a bit of time so start that early. It came up to temp and stayed there! We are still trying to figure out which cut of meat works best with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Erin McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, there has been nothing wrong with my "Instant Pot SSV800 Accu Slim Sous Vide Immersion Circulator, 6 or 8 quart"(Copy&Pasted the title of what I order so you know exactly what I'm talking about). I don't have a legitimate way to test machine's temperature accuracy but it seems to work well with steak(the only thing I have used it for). I have nothing bad to say and I can wholeheartedly say I recommend this product because it has so far(24 days[used 4 times]) functioned reliably and it's priced well. Not to mention it's "name brand" which means you will generally have an easier time with support if it does fail!
customer_reviews.author: Ahrash

customer_reviews.title: New to sous vide cooking
customer_reviews.text: It’s my first sous vide cooker. I’ve been wanting to try one of these for some time now but they were so expensive. This was a bit more reasonable and it does a great job! I’ve only done steaks so far and they were beyond juicy. Gonna try duck next!
customer_reviews.author: S_Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but the cord is a tad short.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this. It is slightly larger than what I was expecting, but it heats up the water at about 1°F per 3-5 seconds, so its pretty fast, understandably. Very accurate. The only issue is the aforementioned size and that a longer cable would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: dzero

customer_reviews.title: must own
customer_reviews.text: had for over a year and it is still kicking strong Easy to use and reliable. No wifi but thats perfectly fine with me This was my first sous vide and it was easy to learn and operate. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I have a friend who has been a professional chef and TV personality who told me to buy one of these 5 years ago. Just got around to doing it now. Love it, cooks perfect steaks and should have bought one 5 years ago! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Best steak of my life!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been putting off getting an immersion cooker, because really how big of a difference could it make? Well apparently, it makes a huge difference! This appliance makes the best steaks I have ever had in my life. I will never cook a steak any other way again. So simple, and always perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Briana Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Easy, simple, cheap
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Works as it says it does. Has temp control and timer. No other controls. For those of a certain age or those who can use timer functions, you're fine. If you need to remote control your food, get that option.
customer_reviews.author: Father of 4

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This device is really easy to use. The buttons has a nice touch. Makes good steaks, cream brulee, and poached eggs for eggs Benedict. My only complaint is that it does take some time to completely heat up to the desired temp. Also the app that comes with it I couldn't get it to work so I downloaded another app for a different brand same watts so I could get an idea of temp and time for recipes. Overall my family approves
customer_reviews.author: Kyle C

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.  Have a glass of wine while your dinner cooks!
customer_reviews.text: We don’t cook steaks or Ribs without using the Sous Vide cooker, other that smoking. The ONLY WAY to get perfectly done meats.
customer_reviews.author: SlumLord

customer_reviews.title: Cooking game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a game changer in the kitchen. Very easy to use and cooks to perfection! I have cooked beef, pork, and chicken so far. I even bought one for a friend who was anxious to try a sous vide cooked meal.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Yeah this is definitely worth it. Especially if you’re just curious about sous vide. Many of the red meats can be very tender by 7 hours but can be cooked for 24 hours with great results. Leg of lamb is especially easy at 140 degrees for 12-24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Its simple.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it’s super quiet, not even sure it’s on sometimes. I picked this one because the metal sleeve is removable for cleaning. I do not like having to set the cook time every time I turn it on. Would be nice if it it would save previous settings like others I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Gurney

customer_reviews.title: Easy and stupid simple. Good starter sous vide- but works for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: Easy and stupid simple Has a cook timer and a temperature adjust. Sous vide reach the temp then run for the allotted time. At which point it will chime About as straight forward as sous vide machines can get- no frills such as blue tooth or wifi
customer_reviews.author: S.N.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, time saver!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and works as intended. So glad I happened upon it. I've always been looking at methods to cook my steak the way I want it and simply. I even experimented with making burgers with this method and it worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Terrill E. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Sous Vide you will love it
customer_reviews.text: I have never Sous Vide before and this has been so easy to use, i have cooked TriTip roast, salmon, chicken breast, ribs and everything has come out great, juices and tender. I have a vacuum sealer and that is how I seal the bags
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! If you like to cook you have to have one of these sous vide immersion circulatory. Makes great pork loin. I'll be doing version next. Fits nicely on my insta pot.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Easy to use and convenient, “set and forget” functionality means you can do other things in the kitchen without having to watch over this. Temperature seems accurate to within a degree. Still experimenting with recipes, but the uniform temperature throughout the food makes for good eating! I’ve used mainly for steaks and reheating vacuum sealed leftovers. Sear steak in grill pan once steak is done and you can’t go wrong. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total Trash
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my girlfriend as a Christmas gift and she loved it. However, once she finally went to use it sometime mid January, it did not work. When she plugged it in the digital screen just kept flickering and she was not able to enter a temp. To make matters worse I was not able to return the product cause the return window had passed on January 4th. I will never recommend this product to anyone I know. If someone at Amazon would like to make good on this, I still have it in its original box collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: great way to cook!!
customer_reviews.text: great way to prepare food, was introduced by a friend this past summer, and loving it so far!! We have done chicken so far and it was great, cooked to perfection. We be doing a long more in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Great addition to Instant Pot family
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Pork was within a couple degrees of what was set after a couple hours.. maybe the thick silicone bag was the culprit. Finished pork on cast iron. Was an awesome dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbeau T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use & very convent. I set it up about 8:30am, set the temp and the cook time for 2 & 1/2 hours and a frozen piece of fish that has bee vacuum sealed is cooked to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully.......................even after accidentally putting it into the water upside down by accident temporarily drowning it.....................after a week of drying out it works perfectly. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marian R

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Cost effective and high quality
customer_reviews.text: As advertised! If you’re looking for a great Sous vide, then look no further. Cost effective and high quality. You won’t be disappointed and best of all it fits perfectly on your instant pot!
customer_reviews.author: fluffythepuffy

customer_reviews.title: Must have kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Prime day. I’ve been wanting one of these and it did not disappoint. First use was on a tri-tip and sous vide for 5 hours. Finished the tri-tip on the grill and the meat was full of flavor and as tender as tenderloin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product from a brand I trust.
customer_reviews.text: We had the Anova Sous Vide, and it worked well until it took a swim, then it stopped working. So I took a chance when the Instant Pot brand was for sale at a pretty reduced price on Black Friday-I am a pretty big fan of the 2 Instant pots I own. I bought 3 Sous Vide’s-2 for gifts. We all are happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but manual is barely readable
customer_reviews.text: The manual has a table of times and temperatures for various meats, etc. It is so faint I can hardly read it. I went online to the InstantPot website, downloaded the manual, and that page is extremely faint. They need to fix it! The sous vide worked great, salmon was perfectly cooked and I like how it attaches to the instant pot inner pot, and its handy to use the instant pot base to further stabilize the whole thing and insulate the inner pot.
customer_reviews.author: Wabi Sabi Fiber Art

customer_reviews.title: Great for the instant pot
customer_reviews.text: I've used it several time for steak and it is very handy. If you lie a perfect steak, this will help. I combine it with my Mealthy air fryer cover for the instant pot to sear after getting the correct internal steak temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Trivigno McNallen

customer_reviews.title: Less power than I would have wanted
customer_reviews.text: It worked as advertised. The food tasted great. I would advise anyone to get the pot to full temperature before starting the sous vide process though as I had a big pot and it could not hold eggs at 94 when I had them at temperature and from cold it took an hour just to get to temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's not as accurate as some of the other models, I think, but it's also not nearly as expensive. For the price, I got everything I was looking for. I could get a more accurate model, but for what I do, I don't believe I need that.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Perfect steaks every time!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! Where has this been all my life?! I can make the most perfect steaks ever and it is soooooo easy to do!
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: My only regret...I’m 55 and just bought my first one...so many wasted years.😂
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t have one you’re straight-up missing out! I’m not so much reviewing the specific product (which is great!) as much as the process. If you’re an enthusiastic carnivore, this is life changing. It’s pretty dang cool for veggies too! Read about the process. It’s the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: MeatLoaf ain’t got anything on Sous Vide
customer_reviews.text: Wow wow wow. As a big InstaPot fan this has changed my tune on cooking. What a steal and what delicious food to prepare. Fish. Steaks. French Dip sandwiches. Jump out and view some videos of people cooking with the Sous Vide and start preparing the best meals ever.
customer_reviews.author: VV

customer_reviews.title: Read directions get a mother book book turn stove off and let cook over night.
customer_reviews.text: Returned because I thought if you need to cook something that’s 34 hrs I’m not leaving stove on. Well don’t have to. Just keep plugged in it will Cook at same temp and shut off. I’m purchasing it again
customer_reviews.author: Scraps

customer_reviews.title: Precise control and fool proof...
customer_reviews.text: Cooks steaks to a perfect medium rare and provides a “hold time” which allows you bring the rest of the meal to the table at just the right time.
customer_reviews.author: HiDP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Works as it should. Very simple to use. Firmly and securely attaches to pot and easily removed and cleaned. I've used it with beef, fish, and mushrooms with incredible success.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Sous vide Cooker
customer_reviews.text: My sister has one and it worked perfectly. Now that I have one, I am loving it. The meat (no matter how thick) is so tender. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian F Pinckney

customer_reviews.title: I'm blown away at how the food is with this thing
customer_reviews.text: I have made a tir-tip and a pork tenderloin with this thing so far and it works fantastically! I am supper happy i picked this up, and i can't wait to keep playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Restaurant meats for a fraction of price
customer_reviews.text: Finally, my favorite restaurant grade meats on my table. A great addition to my instant pot. I use it every week for several times, no more dry steaks!
customer_reviews.author: Oksana

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my first foray into sous vide. This tool does the job well. Simple controls, easy to use, and has been very dependable. It's the only way I'll do a steak from now on!
customer_reviews.author: University Admin Guy

customer_reviews.title: Gift for son but he stated it did a wonderful dinner!
customer_reviews.text: Son loves to cook so we got him this and lots of accessories He stated that he is making wonderful meals so easy for his schedule!
customer_reviews.author: J Kalley

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: Great little sausage vida. Bought this for our travel trailer because of the size. We have a larger one that we use in the house. Ended up needing both for a party. This little guy worked better than the bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Butler

customer_reviews.title: The Instruction Booklet is a Joke
customer_reviews.text: I recieved the product today. I have not yet used it..but C'mon.. Page 9 you will find the cooking instructions. Unreadable. Literally you can't read the text because it is too light. I will come back and review the product again.. but I have to go to google to find proper Time/Temps for each individual Protein.. Was there an Editor involved on the production of the manual? I think not!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A sound choice
customer_reviews.text: This unit works flawlessly. It is easy to operate and clamps to your Instant pot or other container. A nice addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: DiskDevil

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, I might be missing something but if it is plugged in it's on (not heating necessarily but lights are on) so the only way to turn it off is unplugging it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Entry level but works great!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas dinner was a success! Cooked this beef loin to perfection and everyone one left full! Now this doesn’t have Bluetooth or WiFi but works great! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: JBH

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought this one is that I read a review and it mentioned how quiet it is. I wasn’t disappointed. I’ve heard others on how-to videos and they can be really loud. Keeps very accurate temperature
customer_reviews.author: Harv

customer_reviews.title: Great device to use in the hot summer
customer_reviews.text: Love it in the past 2 days I have cooked soft boiled eggs which were great, Corbin the Cobb which was excellent and right now I’m cooking chicken thighs which look yummy
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G

customer_reviews.title: Just go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for less than half one with bluetooth costs. First try was a very expensive rib roast that was perfection!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I have bought off the site in a long time. Does a fantastic job. Set it and forget. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: kmid

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ease of use and versatility because I used this unit in my pots and my ice chest to achieve great results feeding large (25) to small crowds of people. Two thumbs up! Three if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

product_meta.title: Instant Accu Slim Sous Vide, Precision Cooker and Immersion Circulator with digital touchscreen display
product_meta.description: Accu slim sous vide immersion circulator by Instant Pot is designed for the gourmet who strives to create 'restaurant quality dishes' In the Comfort of their home. The accu slim sous vide cooks food at very precise temperatures 104F - 195F/ 40C - 90C for a period of time (up to 72 hours) to achieve succulent, nutritious and delicious meals. The circulator creates and maintains an even and accurately controlled cooking water-bath for perfect cooking results, retaining the vitamins and minerals from within the food, natural flavors are intensified, food is healthier, more tender, juicy, and tastier. The accu slim is versatile, easy-to-use, easy-to-clean kitchen appliance - eliminate works professionally. The sous vide immersion circulator is ideal to use on meat, poultry, seafood, eggs, vegetables, and fruits.
feature_bullets: Creates quality dishes: ACCU slim sous vide immersion circulator prepares high end restaurant quality dishes at home, turning home cooks into gourmet chefs
Consistent cooking: ACCU slim sous vide immersion circulator creates and maintains an even and accurately controlled cooking water bath for perfect cooking results each and every time
Sous vide cooks easily, cooking times range from 10 minutes to 72 hours and temperature ranges from 104f to 195f/ 40c to 90c
Easy to use: Easy to read display, touch screen digital controls, lightweight stainless steel with a rubber coating on the handle
Active pump system: Accu slim sous vide circulates water without relying on convection currents, resulting in uniformly heated water bath free of hot or cool spots
Includes a 12v dc motor: Extremely quietly and has enhanced durability in comparison to standard AC motors used; Motor stops when removed from the water
Clamps securely: To the 6 and 8 quart inner pot either in or out of the instant pot, and can be used with or without an instant pot
Easy to clean: Secure stand up design and removable stainless steel skirt, almost no cleaning required, simply wash and air dry the skirt

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,621 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
